node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `ticket` ( `ticket_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `date_created` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `date_closed` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `locked_comment` char(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `status` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `tickettype` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `user_created` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_assigned` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `locked_user` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `admin_only` int(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `priority` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `summary` char(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`ticket_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: ticket
